name: Top of the Platty
description:
Top of the Platty!

Action game project for Game Dev class.

Hop on the platform for 5 TIMES and win. Bonk your opponent's head to get them off the map!

Pick up powerups to help you get an edge vs your opponent!

Cancel Powerup = Opponent's hops won't count points for 3 secs.

Shield Powerup = You can't get bonked on the head for 3 secs.

CONTROLS

P1 Controls (White):

A and D (leftt-right)

P2 Controls (Black):

Left & Right arrows.

ENJOY!
